Benchmark: Does the mechanism prepare its own budget?

THE SPF'S BUDGET IS PROCESSED IN THE SAME WAY AS OTHER ADB DEPARTMENTS.
THE CRP'S BUDGET IS PREPARED BY THE CRP CHAIR, ENDORSED BY BCRC IN CONSULTATION WITH THE PRESIDENT, REVIEWED BY THE BOARD'S BUDGET REVIEW COMMITTEE, AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD.

IDB_MICI: CONSULTATION PHASE (PS): 40 BUSINESS DAYS FROM THE DATE OF DETERMINATION OF ELIGIBILITY; COMPLIANCE REVIEW: 36 BUSINESS DAYS PLUS BOARD APPROVAL THROUGH SHORT PROCEDURES

Category: Determination of which function to use
Benchmark: When are the affected parties notified of the course of action to be taken?
AfDB_IRM: "PROMPTLY"
IDB_MICI: CONSULTATION PHASE (PS): 40 BUSINESS DAYS FROM THE DATE OF DETERMINATION OF ELIGIBILITY; COMPLIANCE REVIEW: 36 BUSINESS DAYS PLUS BOARD APPROVAL THROUGH SHORT PROCEDURES MICI IDB, H.29, P.15; I.39-41, P.17; MICI IIC, H.29, P.11; I.39-41, P.13
WB_Panel: WITHIN 2 WEEKS OF ELIGIBILITY DETERMINATION BY THE BOARD.  APPROX. 77 DAYS AFTER RECEIPT. REGISTRATION:15 DAYS; MANAGEMENT RESPONSE: 21 DAYS; TECHNICAL ELIGIBILITY AND RECOMMENDATION: 21 DAYS; BOARD VOTE: 10 DAYS; NOTIFICATION: 2 WEEKS (ASSUMING 10 BUSINESS DAYS).

Category: Determination of which function to use

BOARD AFTER CONSIDERING THE CRP'S RECOMMENDATION.
ANY DEPARTMENT CAN OBJECT TO THE CRO'S DECISION TO FORWARD A COMPLAINT TO THE CRP, SPF, OR ANOTHER DEPARTMENT. THE CRO WILL THEN SEEK CLARIFICATION FROM THE COMPLAINANT.
EBRD_PCM: ELIGIBILITY ASSESSORS (PCM OFFICER AND PCM EXPERT)
EIB_CM: CM HEAD - FOR ENVIRONMENTAL AND SOCIAL IMPACTS, AND GOVERNANCE COMPLAINTS, THE CM HEAD DECIDES ON THE ACTION, WITH THE AGREEMENT OF THE INSPECTOR GENERAL. IN GENERAL, THE STARTING POINT IS COMPLIANCE REVIEW.
IDB_MICI: BOARD (OR DONORS COMMITTEE FOR MIF), AFTER CONSIDERING MICI'S RECOMMENDATION

Category: Timeline for Handling Claims (in business days unless noted wth "*")
Benchmark: By when must a decision be made regarding eligibility?
ADB_SPF_CRP:
SPF: APPROX. 52 DAYS; CRP: APPROX. 72 DAYS.

THE SPF TAKES 21 DAYS TO DETERMINING ELIGIBILITY AFTER RECEIVING THE COMPLAINT FROM THE CRO. THE PROCESS CAN TAKE MORE TIME IF ANY DEPARTMENT OBJECTS TO THE CRO'S DECISION ON WHERE TO FORWARD THE COMPLAINT.
EBRD_PCM:
NO LATER THAN 40 DAYS AFTER THE SUBMISSION OF THE BANK MANAGEMENT RESPONSE TO THE COMPLAINT
MANAGEMENT IS GIVEN 21 DAYS AFTER REGISTRATION TO SUBMIT WRITTEN RESPONSE
EIB_CM: INITIAL ADMISSIBILITY DECISION TAKES 10 DAYS. THE ELIGIBILITY DECISION FOR COMPLIANCE REVIEW AND MEDIATION FOR COMPLAINTS ON ENVIRONMENTAL AND SOCIAL IMPACTS AND GOVERNANCE COMPLAINTS TAKES APPROXIMATELY 60 DAYS.

OPIC_OA: COMPLIANCE APPRAISAL: 60 DAYS; MANAGEMENT RESPONSE: 15 DAYS; INVESTIGATION: 6 MONTHS.
WB_Panel: IMPLEMENTATION PLAN: 4-6 WEEKS; INVESTIGATION WITHIN 6 MONTHS. INVESTIGATION PLAN WITH TIME-FRAME ISSUED WITHIN FOUR TO SIX WEEKS AFTER AN INVESTIGATION IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD. THE PANEL SEEKS TO COMPLETE ITS INVESTIGATIONS WITHIN SIX MONTHS FOLLOWING COMPLETION OF THE INVESTIGATION PLAN.
